cn: 早上好，请问有什么可以帮你的吗?

en: I would like to make flight reservations.
I want to book one ticket for the next flight to London.
cn: 我想预订一张飞往伦敦的下一班机票。

en: Would you please make my reservation to Chicago for tomorrow?
cn: 请帮我预订明天去芝加哥的机票好吗?

en: Give me a one-way ticket to L.A.
cn: 给我一张单程到洛杉矶的票。

en: Can I have a second-class one-way ticket to Chicago, please?
cn: 请给我一张去芝加哥的单程二等票好吗?

en: I'd like to get three seats on a flight to Paris on May *
cn: 我想订*张*月*日到巴黎的机票。

en: Do you have any tickets available for that date?
I'd like to take the first available flight.
What time does the plane take off?
Hold on a second please, Let me see...
Just a minute and I'll see if there are any flights.
cn: 请等一下，让我看看是否有航班。

en: Just a second and I will check the schedule.
cn: 稍等一会儿，我查一下时间表。

en: Just a monent,please. Let me check for you.
cn: 请稍等，我来为您查一下。

en: American Airlines has a flight leaving at * a. m.
cn: 美国航空公司有一架班机，在早上*点*分起飞。

en: We have two flights at * p.m. and * p.m.
cn: 我们有两次航班，下午*和*的。
是的，这是直飞巴黎的飞机。

en: We have a nonstop flight leaving at half past ten.
That is not a direct flight.
You need to transfer at Tokyo.
Which would you prefer, first class or economy?
cn: 你喜欢哪种，头等舱还是经济舱?

en: What kind of tickets do you want, first class or economy?
cn: 你要什么类型的票，头等舱还是经济舱?

en: Do you want to fly first or economy class?
cn: 您要头等舱还是经济舱?

en: I'll need an economy ticket with an open return.
cn: 我要经济舱，回程时间不定的来回票。

en: Only first class tickets available, sir.
cn: 现在只有头等舱了，先生。

en: What's the fare for an economy class ticket?
What's the fare to New York for the economy class?
cn: 去纽约的经济舱机票多少钱?

en: Will this be a one-way trip?
How much is the round trip?
Do you have any direct flights coming back?
cn: 回程时你们有直飞的班机吗?

en: Round trip back to Chicago on Janunary *rd.
cn: 我要往返票，*月*日飞回芝加哥。

en: First class fare of a one-way ticket from Beijing to Shanghai is * yuan.
cn: 从北京至上海的单程机票，头等舱是*元。

en: Are there any discount tickets for me?
Will you give me some discount on tickets?
What kind of seats do you want?
Would you prefer a window seat or an aisle seat?
cn: 你想要一个靠窗的位子，还是靠过道的?

en: Could you give me a window seat?
cn: 可以给我靠窗的座位吗?

en: I'd like to have a seat by the window.
cn: 我想要一个靠窗的座位。

en: I'm sorry, but there are no window seats available.
cn: 很抱谦，没有靠窗的座位了。

en: Do you have any other seats open where we can sit together?
cn: 还有没有其他连在一起的座位?
我想要一个走廊的座位。
请给我一个靠走道的座位。

en: Would you please tell me your name, telephone and ID number?
cn: 能告诉我你的名字、手机号和身份证号码吗?

en: Sure! I'm Liuxia. My phone number is * and ID number is *
cn: 当然，我叫刘霞，手机号是*，身份证号是*。

en: Your ticket is in order now.
cn: 您的机票现在完全办妥了。

en: Your seat is confirmed on flight BT* leaving at *
cn: 您的机位以确定，航班号为BT*，*起飞。

en: When shall I come to pick up the ticket?
Come to pay the fare and fetch your ticket two days before departure, please.
cn: 请于起飞前两天来付款取票。

en: Where do I pick up the ticket?
What time do I have to be at the airport?
When am I supposed to check in?
cn: 我应该什么时候检票呢?

en: What time should I check in?
cn: 我应该什么时间办理登机手续呢?

en: You have to be there two hours before departure time.
cn: 你要在飞机起飞前两个小时到达那里。

en: Please check in at the airport two hours before departure.
cn: 请于起飞前*小时到机场办理登机手续。

en: Try to be there by * and the airport will be crowed.
cn: 尽量*到那吧，机场人会很多的。

en: Please be there fourteen o'clock at the latest.
You'll have to get there by * at the latest. The check-in is half an hour earlier than departure.
cn: 最晚*到，因为机场提前半小时检票。

en: You have to be there half an hour before departure time.
cn: 你应该在飞机起飞之前半个小时到那。

en: I need to change my flight date.
Can you change the reservation, please?
cn: 我能更改一下订票的班机吗?

en: I'd like to cancel my reservation for the flight on September * and book one on September * instead, please.
cn: 我想把*月*日预订的班机取消，改订*月*日的班机。

en: OK. wait a moment, please. Sorry, that's all sold out.
cn: 好，请稍等。对不起，*号的都卖完了。

en: Let me see. OK, there is only one ticket left, first class and it is * yuan.
cn: 让我看看，*号就剩一张了，头等舱*元人民币。

en: Do you have any lower fare?
The balance of the fare is * yuan, you have to pay it by yourself.
cn: 票价差额为*元，需要你自理。

en: Where is the check-in counter for China Airlines?
cn: 请问中国国际航空公司办理登机手续的柜台在哪里?

en: May I check in here for flight MU * to Tokyo?
cn: 这里是去东京的MU*航班登机手续办理处吗?

en: Is this the right counter to check in at?
Please follow the signs for zone R to check in.
cn: 请沿着标志引导到Ｒ区办理登机手续。

en: You may check in at the self-service kiosk area in zones G & H.
cn: 你可以在G和H区自助服务亭办理登机手续。
办理飞往世界各地登机手续。

en: What time do you start check-in
cn: ？你们何时开始办理登机手续？

en: When can I start to check in?
cn: 我什么时候开始办理登机手续?

en: Have your ticket and passport ready for the check-in agent.
cn: 请将机票和护照准备好办理登机手续。

en: Please queue for flights to European destinations.
cn: 请排队办理前往欧洲各地的登机手续。

en: Would you please help me to get my boarding pass?
May I see your passport, please?
May I have your passport please?
One economy class seat, is that right
How many pieces of luggage do you have?
You have a lot of baggage.
Do you have any bages to check?
cn: 你有什么行李要托运吗?

en: How many bags do you want to check in?
Please put your baggage on the scale.
cn: 请把您的行李放在磅秤上。

en: You can either take out something or pay the excess baggage charge.
cn: 您可以把一些东西拿出来，或者付行李超重费。

en: Here's your ticket, your boarding pass and the tag of your baggage.
cn: 这是您的机票、登机牌和行李签。

en: Here's your ticket, boarding pass, passport and baggage claim tag.
cn: 这是您的机票，登机证，护照和行李提领证。

en: Where do I board the plane?
At gate * go through the security check and turn left, take the moving staircase at the end of the hall, then you will find it.
cn: *号登机口，在通过安检后左转，走到大厅的尽头乘电梯能到。

en: Is there anything else to do before flight time?
cn: 在起飞前还有其他手续要办吗?

en: No, Miss. Just show your ticket to the boarding officer as you get on the plane.
cn: 没有，小姐。您登机时只要向工作人员出示机票就可以了。

en: The rest is our job. Have a good trip.
cn: 余下的是我们的事，祝您旅途愉快。

en: All bags-packages and persons are subject to search.
cn: 所有行李包裹以及个人一律接受安检。

en: Please put all carry-on luggage in a basket and then place it on the conveyor.
cn: 请把所有的随身行李放在一个筐里，然后把筐放在传送带上。

en: Put your carry-on luggage on the belt, please.
cn: 请把你的手提行李放在传送带上。

en: Will you please put your suitcase and that box on the belt?
cn: 请把你的手提箱和那个盒子放在传送带上好吗?

en: Please take your computer out and put it in the basket.
cn: 请把您的电脑从包里取出放入筐里。

en: Laptop computers must be removed from carry-on and placed on X-ray.
cn: 笔记本电脑从随身行李取出接受X光安检。

en: All portable electronic devices, keys, coins and other metal objects should be placed on X-ray belt in separate container.
cn: 便携电器、钥匙、硬币、和其他金属物品置放单独盒内后，放X光安检传送带上。

en: Now put everything from your pockets in this tray and come through the detector.
cn: 现在请把口袋里的东西掏出来放在这里，从检测器走过。

en: Please put all your metallic objects such as coin,cellphone,chewing gum,cigarettes,and anything with Aluminum foil into the basket.
cn: 请把您随身携带的所有金属物品，如硬币、手机、口香糖、香烟、以 及带锡纸的物品等放在篮子里。
口袋里还有其它物品吗？

en: Take off your coat and shoes and put then in the box.
cn: 脱掉您的外套和鞋子，把它们放进盒子里。

en: All the leaving passengers must go through this gate.
cn: 所有旅客都必须从这个检查口通过。

en: Walk through the security gate, please.
Please pass through the detector one by one.
cn: 请一个一个通过探测门。

en: Please open your bag. We'd like to have a look.
cn: 请把你的包打开，我们要检查一下。

en: Just make sure you don't have any liquid with you.
cn: 我只是要确定你没有携带液体。

en: And would you mind opening your lap-top?
cn: 您介意打开您的手提电脑吗?

en: No, not at all. there you go.
Should I take off my jacket too?
We'll check you by hand, what do you think?
You can't have any liquid with you.
These items are forbidden by law.
You can't take it with you into the aircraft.
Flammable items cannot be taken with you into the aircraft.
cn: 易燃品不能随身带上飞机。

en: We will have to be confiscated.
We could check it in for you ,or you could have it deposited temporarily at our place for up to one month.
cn: 您可以办理托运或在我们这儿办理暂存，我们可以替您保留一个月。

en: If you can't come back within a month, we won't keep it for you.
cn: 如果一个月之内，您不来领的话，我们将不再替您保存。

en: This is the government's rule. For your own safety and other passangers, we need your understanding and corporation.
cn: 这是政府规定的，为了您和其他旅客的安全，请您理解和配合我们的工作。

en: Checking is done, thankyou for your corporation.
You can take your baggage now.
You may go now. Please take your things
Take care, not to leave things behind.
cn: 当心不要遗忘携带物品。

en: We are not responsible for items left over * days.
cn: 遗忘物品超过*天我们概不负责。

en: I wish you a happy joumey.
Attention, please. Due to weather condition, all flights to Taipei will be delayed.
cn: 各位旅客请注意，由于气候不佳，所有飞往台北的班机都将延后起飞。

en: The flight is delayed due to bad weather conditions.
cn: 由于天气不好航班延误了。

en: We truly regret the delay. Thank you for your cooperation and patience.
cn: 我们对此深表谦意，并感谢您的配合与耐心。

en: We will inform you of the new departure time as soon as possible. Thank you.
cn: 我们将尽快通知您的新班机的起飞时候，谢谢。

en: I just heard an announcement that my flight has been delayed.
cn: 我刚听到广播说我的班机延迟了。

en: The delay is due to mechanical difficulties.
cn: 延迟出发是因为机械故障。

en: Do you know how long it will be?
Probably not more than two hours.
I'm afraid I'll miss my connecting flight.
cn: 我会赶不上我下一段的班机了。
现在还有别的班机可以坐吗?

en: Just a minute. Let me check.
Yes, there is a flight leaving for Philadelphia in ten minutes, but it's full. I could put you on standby if you wish.
cn: 有，有一架班机十分钟内去费城，可是已经满座了。我可以把您列为候补，如果您愿意的话。

en: Please put me on the waiting list.
Yes, all right. But if I don't get on that flight, would it be possible to change the connecting flight to Miami?
cn: 好吧。可是假如我上不了那架飞机，能换一班转飞迈阿密的班机吗?

en: Let's see... there's a United flight leaving Philadelphia at * this evening.
cn: 我看一下...今天晚上七点四十五分联合航空公司有一班机由费城起飞。

en: Could you get me on that flight, please?
cn: 能设法让我搭上那班飞机吗?

en: Yes, I'll check to see if there's any space left.
cn: 好，我查查看还有没有剩余位置。

en: Where is the boarding gate for this flight?
cn: 这班飞机的登机口在哪儿?

en: Go straight following the sign ang you will see the gate.
cn: 跟着指示走，你将看到登机口。

en: The next flight available for boarding is to Lincoln, Nebraska.
cn: 下一班可以登机的航班是飞往内布拉斯加州，林肯市。

en: Thai Airlines flight TG * to Bangkok is now boarding.
cn: 飞往曼谷的泰航TG*班，已经开始登机。

en: Passengers in the first class, please proceed to the boarding gate now.
cn: 请头等舱的旅客前往登机门。
请出示登记证和身份证!

en: Please have your ticket or boarding card ready for inspection.
cn: 请把机票和登机牌准备好接受检查。

en: Please have photo identification ready for inspection.
cn: 请准备好带照片的身份证接受检查。

en: Can I see your ticket, please?
Would you please show me your ticket and boarding pass?
cn: 请出示一下你的机票和登机牌好吗?

en: Here are my passport and ticket.

cn: 随身携带的物品限制规定。

en: Goods Prohibited To Exit The Country.
No Smoking Except In Designated Area.
cn: 除指定区域外，禁止吸烟。

en: Can you tell me where seat *A is?
cn: 你能告诉我*A座位在哪儿吗?

en: Can you show me the way to my seat?
Can you help me find my seat?
cn: 你能帮我找到我的座位吗?

en: Your seat is in the middle of the cabin.
cn: 您的座位在客舱的中部。

en: It's over there next to the window.
cn: 就在那里，靠窗的那一个。

en: Excuse me. You have my seat.
cn: 不好意思，你坐到我的位子了。

en: I think this is my seat.
This is supposed to be my seat.
Do you have any empty seats together somewhere?
cn: 哪有在一起的空座位呢?

en: Do you mind changing seats with me?
cn: 你介意跟我换下座位吗?

en: Can I change seats with you?
Would it be possible for us to trade seats?
Can I move to an empty seat over there?
cn: 我可以移到那边的空座位吗?

en: Can I take one of those empty saets over there?
cn: 我可以坐在那边其中的一个空座吗?

en: Could you please help me put my baggage up there?
cn: 可以帮我把行李放上去吗?

en: The overhead compartments are all full.
I can't get my bag to fit into the overhead compartment.
cn: 我的包放不进上面的行李箱了。

en: Where can I put my baggage?
Please put your package under your seat.
cn: 请把你的行李放在座位下面。

en: You can place the baggage under the seat in front of you.
cn: 您可以将行李放在前面的座位下面。

en: How do I recline my seat?
cn: 我怎么让我的椅子躺下?

en: Could you put your seat up, please?
Please keep your seat belt fastened.
Put on your seat belt, please.
Can you tell me how to fasten the seat belt?
cn: 您能告诉我怎么系安全带吗?

en: Can you tell me how to unfasten the seat belt?
cn: 您能告诉我安全带怎么解开吗?

en: The passengers, in preparation for takeoff, please turn off all electronic devices.
cn: 各位乘客请注意，飞机准备起飞了，请关闭所有电子装置。

en: What time does the inflight movie start?
cn: 机上电影什么时候开始播放?

en: This headphone is not working. Can I have a new one?
cn: 这副耳机是坏的，能给我一副新的吗?

en: How do I turn on the light?
When do you start to serve dinner?
cn: 请问晚餐几点开始供应?

en: Please pull your table down. It's supper time.
cn: 晚餐时间到了，请放下桌子。

en: What would you like to have for dinner?
You may choose from the fish and beef.
cn: 你可以选择鱼或者是牛肉。

en: Which would you like for dinner, beef, chicken or fish?
cn: 晚餐想吃牛肉、鸡肉还是鱼?

en: Excuse me. What would you like to eat, Chinese food or Western food?
cn: 打扰一下，请问您要吃什么，中餐还是西餐?

en: Then give me a double Western.
May I have a drink, please?
Sure. What kind of drink do you want?
cn: 当然可以。 你想要什么饮料?

en: What would you like to drink?

cn: 如果可能的话来点鸡尾酒吧。

en: I'm afraid we have no cocktails now.
cn: 现在恐怕没有鸡尾酒了。

en: What about something else, coffee,tea, juice, coke or beer?
cn: 其他的怎么样，咖啡、茶、果汁、可乐、或啤酒?

en: Would you like a cup of tea or coffee?
Well, I'll have a cup of coffee.
No,I'd rather have a glass of juice, please.
We have a selection of orange, apple, grape and lemonade.
cn: 我们有橙汁、苹果汁、葡萄汁和柠檬汁。

en: I'll have a glass of lemonade. More ice,please.
cn: 我要一杯柠檬汁，请多放一点冰块。

en: All right. Will there be anything else?
Could you give me more paper napkins?
cn: 你能多给一些餐巾纸吗?

en: OK. I'll have that right out.
Just let me know if you need anything else.
cn: 如果你需要其他什么东西，就告诉我。

en: Press the call button if you need any more help.
cn: 如果还有其他需求，可以按呼叫按钮通知我们。

en: I feel a little bit cold.
Could you give me one more blanket?
You can also turn down the air-conditioner.
Ladies and gentlemen, we are approaching an area of turbulence.
cn: 各位旅客请注意，本班机即将行经乱流区。

en: For your own safety, please go back to your seat and fasten the seat belts. Thank you.
cn: 请您回到您的座位，并系好安全带，以求安全。谢谢您的合作。

en: When can I use my electronic devices?
cn: 我什么时候才能使用电子设备?

en: After landing on the airport, you can turn on you cell phone.
cn: 飞机降落在机场后，你就能打开手机了。

en: We will be landing at Bangkok international Airport in * minutes.
cn: *分钟后我们即将降落在曼谷国际机场。

en: The local time is * p. m. and the ground temperature is * degrees Centigrade, or * degrees Fahrenheit.
cn: 当地时间为晚上*点*分，地面温度摄氏*度，华氏*度。

en: Captain Tony and all the members of his crew thank you for flying with us.
cn: 机长汤尼与所有组员感谢各位旅客搭乘本班机。

en: We hope you enjoyed your flight.
cn: 我们希望你们满意这次的飞行。

en: I feel dizzy and weak. And I'm having this pain in my ear.
cn: 我感觉头晕、虚弱，耳朵也有点疼。

en: There's an airsickness bag in the seat pocket.
Do you have anything for airsickness?
Do you have any medicine for airsickness?
Could you give me some airsickness medicine?
I'll get some medicine for you right away.
cn: 我马上去给你拿些药来。

en: You can take some airsick pills.
Why does this happen to me when I am on the plane? I feel bad.
cn: 为什么在飞机上会有这种感觉? 我感觉很难受。

en: Don't worry, Sir. It's just due to the lower pressure.
cn: 不用担心，先生。只是由于低气压的缘故。

en: What should I do about it?
You may feel much better if you chew some gum or peanuts.
cn: 如果嚼点口香糖或花生会感觉舒服些。

en: Does that really work? I'll give it a try.
cn: 真的有用吗? 我来试试。

en: You are welcome. Please press the button when you need any help.
cn: 不客气。如果需要什么帮助，请按按钮。

en: I am going to transfer in Hong Kong.
I have to transfer to New York.
Where do I go to catch my connecting flight?
cn: 我要去哪里赶衔接的航班?

en: Could you tell me where to deal with the formalities?
cn: 您能告诉我去哪里办理手续吗?

en: You can go to the flight connection counter.
Please go to the transfer counter.
Where is the CAL transfer desk?
cn: 华航的转机柜台在哪里?

en: When will the connecting flight take off?
cn: 衔接的航班什么时候起飞?

en: Can I get on the earlier flight instead?
cn: 我可以换成早一点的航班吗?

en: Do you have the boarding pass for the next flight?
cn: 您有下一趟航班的登机牌吗?

en: How do I deal with my luggage?
Your luggage will be trasferred to your next plane.
cn: 您的行李将会转到下一班飞机上。

en: We have enough time to transfer the flight.
cn: 我们有足够的时间转飞机。

en: There is enough time for us for the connection.
cn: 我们有足够的时间转飞机。

en: All the connecting passengers are requested to proceed to Gate *
cn: 所有转机旅客请到*号登机门。

en: How can I get to the baggage claim area?
cn: 去行李领取处怎么走呢?

en: Where is the baggage claim area?
Which carousel is for flight TG *? TG
Excuse me, this is my bag.
cn: 借过一下，这是我的行李。

en: Where can I find a baggage trolley?
Can you tell me your flight number?
cn: 能告诉我你乘坐的航班号吗?

en: Please give me your baggage claim tag.
cn: 请给我你的行李领取牌。
你能描述一下你的行李吗?

en: It's a green suitcase with wheels.
cn: 它是有轮子的绿色行李箱。

en: I'll check it for you at once.
Can you help me get my baggage? It's too heavy.
cn: 你能帮我拿行李吗? 实在太重了。

en: Where can I get a baggage trolley?
cn: 我在哪儿能得到行李车?

en: You must be tired after such a long flight.
cn: 经过长途飞行后你一定累了。

en: I feel very tired, because it's a very long flight.
cn: 我感觉很累，因为飞行时间很长。

en: Let me help you with your luggage.
I am getting my car at the parking lot.
Let's go to the parking space directly.
We could grab a quick bite.
Are there any restaurants still open near here?
cn: 这附近还有在营业的饭店吗?

en: Where would you like to go for dinner?
Do you have any particular restaurant in mind?
cn: 你想好有什么特别的餐馆吗?

en: Do you have one to recommend?
Could you recommend some good restaurants around here?
cn: 你能推荐几家附近的好餐馆吗?

en: The restaurant across the street is excellent.
cn: 街对面的那家餐馆不错。

en: This restaurant is famous for the seafood.
I think we should go and have a try.
I don't want to eat there.
It is very hard to find a seat in this restaurant in the evening.
cn: 晚上在这家餐厅很难找到座位。

en: The restaurant is so popular that you have to wait for one to two hours to get a seat.
cn: 这家餐厅太出名了，要等一两个小时才有座位。

en: This restaurant is more expensive than that one.
cn: 这家餐馆比那一家贵得多。

en: Prices of food in this restaurant are much higher than that in other restaurants.
cn: 这家餐厅的价格比其他的餐厅高。

en: Let's choose the least expensive restaurant today.
cn: 我们今天选家最便宜的餐馆吧。

en: Good evening. Welcome to our restaurant.
cn: 晚上好，欢迎光临我们饭店。

en: I've made a reservation at your restaurant.
cn: 我已经在你们餐厅预订过了。

en: I've reserved a table for two.
I have a reservation under Peter Li.
cn: 我有在皮特名下的预订。

en: Our waiter will show you to your table.
cn: 我们的服务生会带您到餐位。

en: Please wait here or take advantage until our hostess escorts to your table.
cn: 请稍等或自便，有人会领你入座。

en: I'll show you to your table.
No, I haven't reserved in advance.

cn: 抱歉，我们位子被订满了。

en: We'd love a table for four.
We need a table for four.
Do you have a table for four please?
cn: 你能安排一张四人桌吗?

en: Where would you prefer to sit?
Would you like the smoking or non-smoking section?
cn: 您喜欢吸烟区还是非吸烟区?

en: Do you prefer a smoking or non-smoking area?
cn: 您喜欢吸烟区还是非吸烟区?

en: I'll find a table for you.
I'll check if we have vacancy.
Could you wait at the bar until I find an approprite table for you?
cn: 您能在吧台等一下，我为您找张合适的桌子?

en: I'm afraid all our tables are taken.
cn: 恐怕我们所有的桌子都被占用着。

en: Would you mind waiting until one is free?
cn: 您介意等一下空出桌子吗?

en: Would you take a seat over there and I will call you when a table is free?
cn: 您能在那边的座位上等一下，当有空桌时我会通知您好吗?

en: Could you wait in line until a table is free, please?
cn: 请您排队等候空位好吗?

en: Could you wait a little longer, please?
cn: 请您等稍长点时间可以吗?

en: We have a table for you now.
I'm very sorry to have kept you waiting.
We're very sorry for the delay.
cn: 我们很抱歉延误了这么长时间。

en: Will this table be all right?
This table is too close to the toilet.
Can we have a quiet area?
cn: 我可以要一个安静的地方吗?

en: I think we'd like to take that one by the window.
cn: 我们想还是靠窗的那张吧。

en: The table over there has been reserved.
cn: 那边那张桌子已经被预定了。

en: The one by the window has been taken by others.
cn: 靠窗的那张已经有人预订了。

en: I'm afraid that table is reserved for * p.m.
cn: 恐怕那张桌子晚上*点以后被预定了。

en: I'm afraid that area is under preparation.
cn: 恐怕那一区还在准备中。

en: It doesn't matter. This one will do.
Your hat and scart can be hung here.
cn: 您的帽子和围巾可以挂在这儿。

en: Would you prefer sitting inside or outside?
cn: 您比较喜欢做里面还是外面?

en: May I get a high chair for the baby?
cn: 我可以给婴儿拿个高脚椅吗?

en: Would you like a high chair for your baby?
cn: 您想要一个高脚椅给婴儿吗?

en: Would you like me to bring a baby chair?
cn: 您需要我拿个婴儿椅吗?

en: Shall I bring a cushion for the little one to sit on?
cn: 我需要拿个垫子为小朋友坐吗?

en: You may look at the menu first and decide what you like to have.
cn: 请先看看菜单再决定点什么菜。

en: I'm going to have one waitress to serve you.
cn: 我去安排一个服务员过来。

en: Our waitress will be with you in a moment.
Our waitress will get you tea in a minute.
cn: 服务员马上就给您上茶。

en: A waiter will come to take your order.
cn: 服务员会过来为您点餐。

en: Let us raise the glass to friendship.
We can have another toast for that. Cheers!
cn: 为了这个我们再次祝酒，干杯！

en: Please give me the paper towel.
Could you get a few small plates for us?
Would you please bring me a knife and fork?
Waiter! I have a small problem.
cn: 服务生! 我有点问题。

en: This glass is stained and it really spoiled my appetite very much.
cn: 杯子有污垢，这可真倒胃口。

en: This knife is so blunt that it can't even cut beancurd.
cn: 这刀太钝了，甚至连豆腐都切不了。
我们的菜在那儿呢?(我们的才怎么还没来呀?)

en: The dishes are offered too slowly.
We've been waiting for an hour.
cn: 我们已经等了一个小时了。

en: I've been waiting half an hour for my order.
cn: 从我点餐到现在等了半个小时了。

en: I order my meal at least * nimutes ago and it still hasn't come.
cn: 我至少*分钟前点的餐，到现在还没来。

en: I've been waiting for a long time but nobody came to serve me.
cn: 我们已经等了很长时间了，但没人来为我们服务。

en: We came here before they did. How come they were served first?
cn: 我们比他们先到，怎么他们先得到服务?

en: Could you see if it's ready?

cn: 我这就去看看你点的菜。

en: I'll check your order with the chef.
cn: 我会和厨师查对您点的菜。

en: Would you please serve a little quicker?
Do you think you could tell the kitchen to speed it up a little bit?
cn: 你能告诉厨房速度快一点吗?

en: I'll try to hurry things up.
I'll hurry. Please wait a moment.
cn: 我会快点的，请稍等一会儿。

en: The kitchen is very busy today.
Our chef is trying his best.
cn: 我们的厨师正在尽最大的努力。

en: I'll be right back with your order.
cn: 我会立即为您送上餐点。

en: Why is it taking so long?
Why is it taking so long for the food to arrive?
Does it need to take so long?
How much longer are we going to have to wait for our dinner?
cn: 我们还要等多久才能吃上饭呢?

en: I'm afraid we have no more time to wait.
cn: 我想我们没时间再等了。

en: I'd like to cancel my order.
Please cancel my order if the food is not ready.
cn: 如果饭菜没做好的话请取消我的点餐吧。

en: Your food is being cooked. I'm afraid it's too late to cancel it.
cn: 你的食物正在做，恐怕取消太晚了。

en: I can't understand why this restaurant always serves so slowly.
cn: 我不明白这个饭店为什么总是上菜这么慢。

en: Your meal, we're really sorry for the delay.
cn: 你的菜，我们真的很抱歉耽搁了。

en: I'm afraid there is a mistake.
I think you have made a mistake with my order.
cn: 我想你上错我的点的菜了。

en: I don't think I ordered this dish.
This is not what I ordered.
I might have made a mistake.
Could you repeat your order again?
I'm very sorry for the mistake.
Please be more careful in the future.
I hope you enjoy your meal.
cn: 我希望您喜欢您的食物。

en: The food has a funny smell.
This is not the right flavor.
The dish I ordered was not fresh.
It seems that the seafood has gone bad.
My fish is not cooked enough.
I don't think this fish is proberly cooked.
cn: 我觉得这鱼好像没做熟。

en: I don't want the yolk to be too well-done.
My steak is tough and overdone.
There is a fly in my soup.
I'm not happy about the dish.
I'm not very happy with the quality of the food here.
cn: 我对这里的饭菜质量非常的不满意。

en: I'll return your suggestion to the chef.
cn: 我会向主厨反应你的意见。

en: I'll ask the chef to explain to you.
cn: 我会请主厨来向您解释。

en: I'll have the chef prepare another one.
cn: 我会请厨师准备另一份。

en: I'll tell the kitchen to prepare a new one for you.
cn: 我会告诉厨房为您再做一份新的。
我会给你另外拿来一份。

en: I'll send this back to the kitchen and get you a new one.
cn: 我会把它送回厨房，换拿给您为一份新的。

en: There will be no charge for this.
Your meal is on the house.

cn: 我已经与厨房检查过了。

en: There isn't anything wrong with this food.
If you don't like the taste of it, perhaps I could get you something else?
cn: 如果您不喜欢这口味，或许我给你换成其他的?

en: You have a problem with your attitude.
Could I talk to someone in charge?
I'd like to see to your manager.
May I have a doggy bag?
I'd like to take the rest home.
cn: 我想把剩下的打包回家。

en: Please pack the leftovers for me.
Wrap the steak up for him, so he'll take it with.
cn: 打包这份牛排，他要带走。

en: Why don't you wrap his steak up?
cn: 你为什么不打包他的牛排?

en: Do you have time for coffee?
Let's stop at a coffee shop.
cn: 让我们在咖啡店歇会儿。

en: Why do you like coffee shop?
Coffee shops are not only a good place to get a cup of coffee, but also a great place to meet customers.
cn: 咖啡店不仅是喝咖啡的好地方，而且是会见客户的好地方。

en: Many cafes are now equipped with Wi-Fi.
cn: 现在很多咖啡店都装有无线网络。

en: You can surf the Internet while enjoying your coffee.
cn: 你在品尝咖啡的时候可以浏览网络。

en: Is there a cafe near by?
cn: 请问附近有没有咖啡店？

en: What kind of coffee do you have?
What kind of drinks you got?
What do you have to drink?
Would you like some tea or coffee?
Give me a cup of coffee.
A cup of coffee for me, and a glass of apple juice for her.
cn: 我要一杯咖啡，她要一杯苹果汁。

en: How would you like your coffee?
What coffee would you like,black coffee or white coffee?
cn: 你喜欢什么咖啡，黑咖啡还是牛奶咖啡？

en: A small cup of strong black coffee without milk or cream.
cn: 小杯浓的黑咖啡，不加牛奶和奶油。

en: Would you like some cream in your coffee?
cn: 你的咖啡要加点奶油吗?

en: I'd like a coffee with sugar.
Do you have any sugar substitute?
I don't want to intake any sugar.

cn: 来一杯没有咖啡因的咖啡。
给我一杯没有咖啡因的咖啡。

en: Some black coffee will help to sober me up
Do you serve anything else besides drinks? Say, cake.
cn: 除了喝的你们这还有什么别的吗? 比如蛋糕。

en: We also serve sandwiches and cakes.
cn: 我们还供应三明治和蛋糕。

en: Give me two pieces of cake.
Can you come here when you have a second?
cn: 你有空时能到这里来一下吗?

en: Yes, sir. How can I help you?
cn: 来了，先生。有什么需要帮忙的?

en: OK. And anything else I can do for you?
cn: 好的，还有什么别的需要吗?

en: May I have another black coffee,please?
cn: 请再给我一杯黑咖啡好吗？

en: When does the coffee shop close?
cn: 咖啡店什么时候打烊呢？

en: We lazed the whole afternoon away at a cafe.
cn: 我们在一家咖啡馆消磨了整个下午。

en: The Pearl River Hotel. anything I can do for you?
cn: 这是珠江宾馆，我能为您做什么?

en: Advance Reservations. Can I help you?
cn: 这儿预订房间，需要效劳吗?

en: I'd like to make a reservation.
I'd like to reserve a room.
I'd like to reserve some rooms for a tourist party.
cn: 我想为一个旅游团订一些房间。

en: What date will you check in?

cn: 小姐，请问什么时间入住?

en: Which date would you that be?
For the night of April *th for one night.
What kind of room would you like?
We have single rooms, double rooms, suites and luxury suites, etc.
cn: 我们有单人房，双人房，套房和豪华套房等等。

en: I'd like to book a single room with a bath from the afternoon of February *th to the morning of february *th.
cn: 我想订一个带洗澡间的单人房间，从*月*日下午到*月*日上午。

en: I'm calling from Nanjing. I'd like to reserve a single room from tomorrow for six days, please.
cn: 我从南京打来电话。我想预订一个单人房，明晚开始，共*天。

en: I'd like to book a double room for next Tuesday.
cn: 下星期二我想订一个双人房间。

en: That's fine. A double room for Tuesday, September *th.
cn: 好的。星期二，*月*日，一个双人间。

en: How long do you plan to stay?
How long will you be staying?
We'll be leaving on Sunday morning.
Could you hold the line, please? I'll check our room availability for that day.
cn: 请别挂断? 我要查一下那天的空房间。

en: Thank you for waiting, Sir. We have a vacancy for that period.
cn: 让您就等了。我们这段时间有房间。

en: Could you tell me the current price?
cn: 你能告诉我现在房价是多少吗?

en: What's the rate for a standard room?
It's two hundred and twenty yuan per night.
The current rate is * yuan per night.
It's $* including breakfast and room service.
That sounds not bad at all. I'll take it.
cn: 听起来还不错。这个房间我订了。

en: Could you tell me your name, Sir?
cn: 能告诉我你的名字吗，先生?

en: How do you spell it, please?

cn: 请问你的电话号码是多少?

en: By the way, how would you like to pay for it?
cn: 另外，您准备怎样付款呢?

en: I see. When can I receive your confirmation?
cn: 明白了。我什么时候可以得到你们的确认?

en: Not until you have paid a * percent deposit.
cn: 您只要支付*%的预订金，我们就予以确定。

en: I'll log in to the Internet to find out about you. I know your address.
cn: 我还是上因特网去看吧。我知道你们的网址。

en: Could I ask when you will arrive?
I'll get there by five o'clock on August *th.
cn: 我会在*月*日*点之前到达。

en: We'll have the room ready for you.
cn: 我们会为您准备好房间。

en: Thank you for booking in our hotel.
cn: 谢谢您预定我们的宾馆。

en: OK. We look forward to your visit.
cn: 好的，我们期待您的光临。

en: OK. Thank you and we look forward to your arrival.
cn: 好的，谢谢您，我们期盼您的到来。

en: We look forward to seeing you next Tuesday.
cn: 我们盼望下星期二见到您。

en: I'd like reserve a room facing the sea.
All our rooms are full occupied.
cn: 我们所有的房间都满了。

en: I'm afraid our hotel is fully booked on that night.
cn: 本店那晚恐怕已经登记满了。

en: I am afraid that all the room with a view to the sea have been booked.
cn: 恐怕所有看得到海的房间都已经被预订了。

en: And now you want to change the booking, do you?
cn: 你想变更一下入住时间吗?

en: Is it possible for you to change your reservation date?
cn: 你可不可以改变预约日期呢?

en: We might have cancellations. Could you call us again closer to the date?
cn: 或许有人会取消预约，请您接近哪个日期时再打电话好吗?

en: Sure, but if you do have any cancellations, could you let me know as soon as possible?
cn: 好的，如果真有人取消，能不能尽快让我知道呢?

en: I'm very sorry, Sir, but we are unable to do that. We would appreciate it very much if you could call us instead.
cn: 先生，非常抱歉，我们不能那样做，如果您能打电话来，我们将会非常感激。

en: Room Reservations. May i help you,sir?
cn: 客房预定。先生有什么需要我帮忙的吗?

en: Yes, my name is Alice, and I made a reservation for two nights from October *th. I'd like to extend it for two more nights until the *th.
cn: 是的，我的名字是爱丽丝，我预订了房间从*月*日保留两个晚上，我将延长两个晚上直到*号。

en: For * nights from October *th until October *th.
Will there be any change in your room type? Your reservation is for a twin room.
cn: 您需要变化你的房间类型吗？你预定的是一间双人床的。

en: Thank you, sir. We will extend the reservation for you.
cn: 谢谢，先生。我们将为您扩大保留。

en: I booked a single room in your hotel for this friday.
cn: 我在你们宾馆预定了这周五的单人房间。

en: I'm sorry to say that I have to cancel it.
cn: 我很抱歉，我不得不取消这个预定。

en: I'd like to cancel a reservation.
May I have your name, please?
cn: 请把你的名字告诉我好吗?

en: In whose name was the reservation?
How do you spell that, please?
cn: 请讲一下是怎么拼写的?

en: What was the date of the reservation?
Excuse me, but is the reservation for you?
May I have your name and phone number, please?
cn: 能告诉我你的名字和电话吗?

en: It's Mary Calson and my number is *-*
cn: 我叫玛丽凯撒和我的电话*-*。

en: Thank you, ma'am.I'll cancel Mr.Bruder's reservation from October *nd for * nights.My name is Jason and we look forward to another chance to serve you.
cn: 谢谢你太太，我们将取消布鲁特尔从*月*号三个晚上的预定，我的名字叫杰桑，我们下次一个机会为您服务。
我已经取消了你的预定。

en: Price According To Season And Size Of Flat.
cn: 价格按季节和公寓大小而定。

en: Stay A Minimum Of * Nights And Receive * Extra Night Free.
cn: 住三晚，可额外免费赠一晚。

en: Double Lock Door. Use Safety Latch.
cn: 双保险门闩，请使用安全碰锁。

en: Use Door Viewer To Identify Callers Prior To Opening Door.
cn: 开门前通过猫洞鉴别叫门人身份。

en: Never Open Door Prior To Verifying ID.
cn: 没有确认对方身份绝对不能开门。
贵重物品随身携带/贵重物品请自行妥善保管。

en: Please Take care Of Your Belongings.

cn: 请保管好随身携带的贵重物品。

en: Safe Deposit Boxes Are Available At Front Desk.

cn: 报告可疑人员或可疑行为。
将钥匙卡插入或擦过处理机。

en: Please Return This Key Card To The Front Desk When You Check Out.
cn: 结账时请将钥匙卡归还前台。

en: Do Not Smoke In The Bed.
A Cleaning Fee Of $* Will Be Charged To Your Room Account If You Smoke In This Room.
cn: 违者将被从账户中扣除$*罚金作为清洁费用。

en: Full Central Heating With House Provided Hot Water * Hours.
cn: 中央暖气系统，房间*小时提供热水。

en: Tea(Coffee) Making Facility In All Bedrooms.
cn: 所有卧室有沏茶（煮咖啡）设备。

en: Be Careful When Using The Bath.
Depress Handle Until Bowl Is Empty.
cn: 压下把手直至便盆冲净为止。
所有卧室备有刮脸插销。

en: Warn Children Of The Risk Of Death By Electric Shock.
If You Forget To Pack Any Standard Toiletry Item（Toothbrush, Toothpaste, Shaving Cream, Razor Or Comb）, Just Call The Front Desk And We'll Get You A Complimentary Repacement Right Away.
cn: 如果您忘了把洗漱物品打入您的包裹（如牙刷，牙膏，剃须膏，剃须刀或梳子），请给前台电话，我们可以立即提供赠送替代品。

en: For Your Convenience, Cigarettes Are Available At The Front Desk.
cn: 为了您的方便，前台有香烟出售。
夜间有行李搬运服务生。

en: Early Book For Lunch Or Dinner.
Guest Rooms In This Hotel Are Not Equipped With Wireless(Wifi) High Speed Internet Access.
cn: 本酒店旅客房间内没有无线上网设施。

en: Wifi Is Available In Public Area In The Hotel.
cn: 在酒店的公共场所可以登陆无线英特网。

en: Please Call The Hotel Operator For More Information.
cn: 可以打电话询问酒店接线员更多信息。

en: For More On High Speed Internet Access, Including Trouble Shooting Information, Please Refer To The Guest Service Directory.
cn: 请查阅旅客服务指南获取更多的有关高速上网以及如何排除故障的信息。
我们随时倾听您的意见。

en: We Are Committed To Doing What It Takes To Make Your Stay As Comfortable As Possible.
cn: 为了让您尽可能舒适我们愿意付出一切。

en: Our Front Desk Team Is Available * Hours A Day To Address Any Of Your Needs.
cn: 我们前台服务团队每天*小时为您解决一切问题。

en: Just Let Our Manager On Duty Or Front Desk Staff Know If Any Part Of Your Stay Isn't Satisfactory.
cn: 如果某处不尽人意请告诉我们的值班经理或前台服务人员。

en: We Promise To Make It Right Or You Won't Pay For That Part Of Your Stay.
cn: 我们承诺将立即整改，否则您可以拒绝支付相关服务的费用。

en: Do Not Hesitate To Contact Us.

cn: 您的满意就是我们的宗旨。

en: Making Your Stay A Complete Success Is Our Goal.
cn: 让您居住的完全满意是我们的宗旨。

en: Employees Must Wash Hands Before Returning To Work.
cn: 员工便后必须洗手方可回到工作岗位。

en: How many people are in your family?
My parents and my younger sister.
Do you live with your parents?
What sort of job do you do at ABC?
cn: 你在ABC公司担任什么职务?
你在那里从事什么工作?

en: My job is to teach students.
What kind of work do you do?
What do you do for a living?
cn: 你靠什么来谋生（你做什么工作）?
这里是我的电话号码、电邮。

en: May I have your telephone number and address?
cn: 我可以得到你的电话号码和地址吗?

en: Can you give me your contact information?
cn: 你能给我你的联系方式吗?

en: I'd like you to meet a friend of mine.
cn: 我想让你见见我的朋友

en: I want you to meet Bob.
Let me introduce you to eath other.
cn: 让我来给你们相互介绍。

en: You look like one of my friends.
cn: 你看起来像我的一个朋友。

en: You look like someone I know.
cn: 你看起来像我认识的一个人。

en: No, I don't think we've met.

cn: 我可以知道你的名字吗?

en: May I ask where you come from?
cn: 我可以问一下你从哪里来吗?

en: We took a trip to the supermarket.
Let's get a shopping cart first.
Here, take one of these trolleys.
Do you want to try it?
Are you looking for something particular?
I can't find the pet food.
Where can I find the diary products?
They are on the chelf right behind you.
Which aisle are the canned goods at?
At what aisle is the frozen food?
Do you remember which aisle this was at?
cn: 你记得这货物在哪条货道里吗?

en: Can anyone tell me where I can buy the ingredients to make Chinese food?
cn: 谁能告诉我哪里可以买到做中国菜的原材料?

en: Where is the fruit and vegetable section?
The fruit and vegetables are over there.
It's at the end of this aisle.
Go all the way to the back and turn right.
How much dose this meat weight?
Slice me half a kilo of beef.
Give me a pound of tomatoes and a pound of eggplants.
cn: 给我一磅番茄和一磅茄子。

en: Do you sell organic vegetables here?
Yes, we do. They're right in front of you.
You should have a sign. That way people could identify which are organic and which aren't.
cn: 你们应该要有标识，让顾客知道哪些是有机蔬菜，那些不是。

en: The organic vegetables are marked with the blue label. Here, do you see?
cn: 有机蔬菜都有蓝色的标签。在这里，看到了吗?

en: There is no price on this item.
We need to buy some soya sauce. Which aisle is the soya sauce in?
cn: 我们想买一些酱油，酱油在哪一个通道?

en: That would be in aisle * with the condiments. It is right next to the ketchup.
cn: 在第七走道，和调味品一起，就在番茄酱的旁边。

en: We have a clearance sale today.
Do you have this in stock?
Do you have more of this item in stock?
I'm afraid We don't have it in stock.
I'm afraid we're out of that item.
cn: 恐怕那种货已经卖完了。

en: Sorry. It's out of stock now.
Easy to use and great value too.
for use only in case of fire
please leave your luggage with you at all times
take care not to leave things behind

cn: 坐着的时候放脚的支撑物

en: no smoking except in designated area
cn: 除指定区域外，禁止吸烟
